# contentWidth

**Instance Property**

The width of the text block.

## Declaration

```swift
var contentWidth: CGFloat { get }
```

## Discussion

This property interpreted according to the value type returned by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/contentWidthValueType].

## Working with dimensions of content

- **setValue(_:type:for:)**: Sets a dimension of the text block.
- **value(for:)**: Returns the value of the specified text block dimension.
- **valueType(for:)**: Returns the value type of the specified text block dimension.
- **setContentWidth(_:type:)**: Sets the width of the text block.
- **contentWidthValueType**: The type of value stored for the text block width.
- **NSTextBlock.Dimension**: The following constants specify values used by the methods [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/setValue(_:type:for:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/value(for:)], and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/valueType(for:)] to specify text block dimensions.
- **NSTextBlock.ValueType**: The following constants specify values used by the methods [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/setValue(_:type:for:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/valueType(for:)] to specify text block value types.
